education.universityPara: Tiangong University former name ( Tianjin Polytechnic University ) is a university jointly established by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China and Tianjin City. It is the only university in Tianjin jointly established by the National Defense Science, Technology and Industry Bureau and the Tianjin Municipal People's Government. It is a key full-time general institution of higher learning in Tianjin.
